results_text: Confederate tactical victory (The results, however, forced Marmaduke to end his expedition, making this a Union strategic victory.)
description: Union Brig. Gen. William Vandever pursued Brig. Gen. John S. Marmaduke to Chalk Bluff, where the Confederates hoped to cross the St. Francis River. To ford the river, Marmaduke established a rearguard that received heavy punishment on May 1-2. Although most of Marmaduke's raiders crossed the St. Francis River, they suffered heavy casualties and therefore ended the expedition.
forces_text: 2nd Division, Army of the Frontier and force under command of Brig. Gen. John McNeil [US]; Marmaduke's Cavalry Division [CS]

US.description: 2nd Division, Army of the Frontier and force under command of Brig. Gen. John McNeil

principal_commanders: Brig. Gen. William Vandever [US]; Brig. Gen. John S. Marmaduke [CS]
